nodes.text: A Force Hound served the Infinite Empire during the Rakata species' invasion of the Tython system. Garbed in dark robes and wearing a helmet with a triangular red eyepiece, the Force Hound used a purple Forcesaber in combat. In 25,792 BBY, the Force Hound rode a winged beast during the fighting on the planet Shikaakwa and sought to kill the former Hound Xesh. However, the Je'daii Shae Koda slew the Hound's mount, and when the Force-sensitive warrior attacked Xesh after surviving the crash, Xesh ended his enemy's life with a thrust through the heart.

The unnamed Force Hound appeared in the comic book Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 1, which was released on November 20, 2013. The Hound's species and gender were not revealed, and neither was the Aurebesh letter that the Hound was named after and tattooed with.
